Text: Tak abu kʼi kwotʼo̩ko̩, i mʼomi daba oñ i lewa ewo e-wñ.
Me̩ la go, ma mʼe̩no̩ga ekuto̩la kʼi dachi oj ate̩ du wʼugbo-wñ; oñ abu ku Jisus li e̩do̩ ekono-ma, i ka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩ kakini, O̩ma-mi, fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ ke; ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩ me̩.
Me̩ la go, amako̩takada iche̩ka ka ef uma kakini, E̩ne̩-i achakpabie̩ O̩jo̩.
Tak abu ki Jisus chema ibe ku ma kpe̩ le̩, i kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ kpʼibe bibi efe̩do̩-me̩?
Todu, kali e-kʼi tukpo̩ eka tule, kakini, Ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩ me̩, abe̩ku, Kwane̩ kʼe̩ lule̩?
Ama todu kʼame̩ ki ma ka kʼO̩ma One̩ nʼo̩da kʼi atʼadure no ñw one̩ ane̩-ile̩-i, e̩gbale̩ tak i ka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩ kakini, Kwane̩, mʼate̩-we̩ du kʼe̩ lo tʼunyi-we̩.
Tak i kwane̩, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ li ma kworailo, ma chane̩ edojima ñw O̩jo̩ kʼi dʼo̩da abe̩le̩ ñw one̩.
Tak abu ki Jisus kwʼo̩mo̩ alale, i li e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi gugu unyi ugbo ku ma gbʼo̩kane̩, odu-wñ ko̩ Matiu. Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Tʼumi ubi. Tak i kwane̩ atʼo̩ ubi.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼi chekukane̩ ef unyi, me̩ la go, amagbo̩kane̩ kpʼame̩nadure wewe lewa chekukane̩ kpai Jisus kpʼamako̩che̩-wñ.
Tak abu kʼamaFarisi li, ma ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼako̩ me̩ e̩wñ aje̩-wñ kpʼamagbo̩kane̩ kpʼame̩nadure ta?
Oñ abu kʼi gbʼo̩, i kakini, Eku obochi ku abo kʼo̩la-ma gbiti n, chai abo kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ dʼo̩la-ma
Me̩ muda lo ku me̩ ko̩che̩ e̩wñ kʼi chʼofe, Ejumomi dʼumi e̩do̩, e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ la dʼumi e̩do̩ n; todu u wa kʼu do̩ abo̩kpakpa n, chai ame̩nadure.
E̩gbale̩ amako̩che̩ Jo̩n lewʼugbo-wñ, ma kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼawa kpʼamaFarisi ajialu, kʼamako̩che̩-we̩ la ajialu n?
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Amo̩ma unyi iyawo neke daido̩ iko kʼo̩ko̩ya dʼugbo ma? Iko̩-wñ muda awa, e̩gba ku ma adʼo̩ko̩ya kwʼugbo ma, tak e̩gbale̩ ma ajialu.
E̩ne̩ du la abʼukpo kʼi ma ro̩nyi ta n gamʼafe̩ igbele n; todu e-ku ma gamʼo̩ kʼi bʼowe-wñ ma afʼo̩la afe̩ le̩, e̩fana-wñ la abie̩ne̩ tule.

Ma la dʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ tef aiko igbele n, cho̩kpo̩ni aiko-wñ akpana; tak omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ adafo, oñ aiko-wñ achihi rinyo̩. Ma muda adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ tef aiko emimi, tak e̩wñ meji le̩ agbane̩.
Abu kʼi nʼo̩la e̩wñ-i aka ñwu ma, go, agbojiʼka wʼugbo-wñ adojikane̩ ñw u, i kakini, O̩ma-mi onobule̩ leku faifai me̩: e̩ muda awa kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩ nʼo tak i adeju.
Taku Jisus kwane̩ tʼo̩ ubi, kpʼamako̩che̩-wñ ge̩.
Me̩ la go, onobule̩ʼka kʼi te̩tarʼe̩bie̩ o̩do̩ me̩gweji, lʼubi-wñ wa dʼo̩wo̩ kad eti afe̩-wñ.
Todu owñ ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼu mʼo̩wo̩ du kad afe̩-wñ kate, i ajadu mi.
Ama abu ku Jisus murida, kʼi la fʼowñ li, i kakini, O̩ma-mi onobule̩, fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ ke; e̩do̩ e̩kono̩-we̩ fʼe̩ jadu me̩. Oñ akwʼauwa kide̩ onobule̩ mujadu.
Tak abu ki Jisus mugudu wʼef unyi agboji le̩ kʼi la go abo ku ma fʼo̩kpachine̩ kpʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma jo̩ achekuku le̩,
i kakini, Me̩ kwʼemi alo: todu o̩ma igbe̩le̩-i ku n, chai olu i ale̩-i. Taku ma dʼoke anyi rʼo oji.
Ama e̩gba ku ma mʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ko dufu, i mugudu tʼejefu agwo̩nyʼu o̩wo̩, tak igbe̩le̩ le̩ kwane̩.
Oñ uwohi-wñ kwodufu tʼo̩gbo̩ oj ane̩ le̩ du.
Tak abu ku Jisus kwʼo̩mo̩ alo, amafeju meji rʼo̩ ubi, ma nakwa kakini, Lʼuwa ejumomi, uwe̩, O̩ma Defid!
Oñ abu kʼi lewʼef unyi, amafeju le̩ wʼugbo-wñ; taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ke̩do̩no ka kʼomi neke che e̩wñ-i? Ma ka ñw u kakini, I-i, Ondu.
E̩gbale̩ i dʼo̩wo̩ kad eju-ma, i kakini, Alu kʼe̩do̩ ekono-me̩ de̩, kʼi dʼabe̩le̩ ñwu me̩.
Tak eju-ma muchi; taku Jisus fʼuma eti kakini, Me̩ nago; e̩ne̩ du ki ma n.
Ama abu ku ma ledufu ma mʼowñ du kpogo ugbo du ane̩ le̩.
Oñ abu ku ma dufu alo, me̩ go, ma mʼajialu kʼi nʼebili du wʼugbo-wñ.
Tak abu kʼi fʼebili le̩ ne dufu, ajialu le̩ kwoko̩la. Oñ o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kwoyaye, ma kakini, E̩wñ abe̩i tejugede ane̩ Israe̩l mama ta n.
AmiFarisi muda kakini, Lugbo agboji amebili oñ i ane amebili dufu.
Oñ Jisus tale ewo ewo du kpʼadogbe adogbe; i nʼe̩wñ ako̩ ma ef unyi ujeju-ma, i la nʼakoya Uche̩nyo̩ o̩da ojane̩ le̩ ata, i laño̩ nʼo̩ga du ache kpa kpʼe̩gbo o̩la du.
Tak abu kʼi fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ li ejumomi-ma je̩ ñw u n, todabu kʼuhia ahia ma, ku ma la chʼefiatuka jo̩ dab amala ku ma ma nʼadide n.
E̩gbale̩ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, E̩wñ ki bie̩ tʼoko-i tabale, ochochi, abuko̩lo̩-wñ muda de̩ ke̩e̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼodu e̩wñ oko-i, todu kʼi kʼabuko̩lo̩ e̩che̩ nyʼef e̩wñ oko-wñ.
